name: Zambulance
description:
Zambulance is a single-player, action, driving simulator where the player controls an ambulance in a zombie apocalypse, rescues injured patients and run down any zombies in the way. 

This game was made for a University of Suffolk module and only represents a slice of a game.  The main goal was to "front load" our development and not succumb to feature creep.  

There are only 3 patients to collect.

ZAMBULANCE TEAM:

Designer/Programmer: Ryan

Level Designer: John 

3D Modeler: Karol
